instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-09 No Backlight
threads.message:
Hi Guys.

I have a A1706 820-00239-09 board no backlight. No liquid damage just stopped. I'm missing EDP_BKLT_EN, voltage present on R8400 contacts 1,2,4.

Q8400 pin 4 13v, pin 3 13v and others no present PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLT which also means PPVIN_SW_LCDBKLT_SW not present.

Any ideas? 

Thanks

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-09 No Backlight
threads.message:
First confirm if you get image on internal LCD.
If not present, check external video at least.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-09 No Backlight
threads.message:
No pulse at all at EDP_BKLT_EN, at the moment when the image appears?
Try another compatible LCD assembly.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-09 No Backlight
threads.message: EDP_BKLT_EN present all the time when lcd is connected. LCDBKLT_SW is missing going to Q8401 all other on mosfet are present

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-09 No Backlight
threads.message: It was playing with the voltages but last time when i measured and saw  LCDBKLT_SW  is missing i resoldered U8400 and solved the issue :D

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-09 No Backlight
threads.message:
Glad to hear is solved.

For the future, post accurate info please; you've mentioned in the first post no EDP_BKLT_EN present...
